description:
In this one-of-a-kind video training course, you will learn how to build a responsive website that will look great and work well across a number of devices including phones, tablets, and PCs.

Our instructors provide expert, straight-forward, user-friendly training to help you tackle the steps and strategies needed to design and build a responsive website. From choosing among available software to design your responsive website to understanding how to test your responsive layouts before making your site live, this course covers it all.

Find out about the software options that are available to analyze your page views. Learn about different types of responsive grid layouts and how to incorporate them into your workflow. Discover how to go from a one column layout for mobile to a multi-column layout for tablet and screen, and understand how to insert and define images so that they will work in a responsive design.

If you’re looking for comprehensive beginning-intermediate video instruction on building a responsive website, you’ll find it here.
title: Building Responsive Websites
